summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to organization of the executive branch of City government; combining the Department of Planning and the Office of Management and Budget to create an Office of Planning and Management within the Executive Department, and creating the Neighborhood Planning Project within the Executive Department; and repealing, adding, or amending numerous sections in Titles 3, 4, 5, 10, 11, 15, 18, 20, and 21 of the Municipal Code in connection therewith.
